bodyweight.name: Push-Ups
bodyweight.form_tips: Keep body straight, elbows at 45°, chest to floor, full range of motion
bodyweight.progression: Add resistance band, elevate feet, add pause at bottom

bodyweight.name: Diamond Push-Ups
bodyweight.form_tips: Hands form diamond shape, elbows tucked, slow controlled movement
bodyweight.progression: Elevate feet, add resistance, increase tempo

bodyweight.name: Decline Push-Ups
bodyweight.form_tips: Feet elevated on chair/bench, maintain straight body, full range
bodyweight.progression: Higher elevation, add weight, slow eccentric

bodyweight.name: Pike Push-Ups
bodyweight.form_tips: Form inverted V, nose to floor between hands, elbows tucked
bodyweight.progression: Elevate feet, move hands closer, full handstand push-up

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Floor Press
dumbbell.form_tips: Lie on floor, retract shoulder blades, elbows 45°, full lockout
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight gradually, add pause, single arm variation

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Press
dumbbell.form_tips: Retract shoulders, chest up, 45° elbow angle, control descent
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, tempo training, alternating arms

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Flyes
dumbbell.form_tips: Slight elbow bend, wide arc motion, squeeze at top
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, slow tempo, single arm

calisthenics.name: Dips (Using Chairs)
calisthenics.form_tips: Lean slightly forward, elbows tucked, full depth, controlled
calisthenics.progression: Add weight in backpack, single leg, negative reps

bodyweight.name: Pull-Ups (Doorframe/Bar)
bodyweight.form_tips: Overhand grip, full hang, chin over bar, controlled descent
bodyweight.progression: Add weight, slow tempo, typewriter pull-ups

bodyweight.name: Inverted Rows (Table/Door)
bodyweight.form_tips: Body straight, pull chest to bar, squeeze shoulder blades
bodyweight.progression: Lower angle, elevate feet, add weight

bodyweight.name: Superman Holds
bodyweight.form_tips: Lift chest and legs, squeeze glutes, hold position
bodyweight.progression: Longer holds, add pulses, add weight

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Rows
dumbbell.form_tips: Support on bench/chair, pull to hip, squeeze at top, control
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, slow tempo, pause at top

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Pullovers
dumbbell.form_tips: Perpendicular to bench, stretch at bottom, pull with lats
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, floor variation, slow tempo

dumbbell.name: Renegade Rows
dumbbell.form_tips: Plank position, row without rotating, core engaged
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, add push-up between reps

bodyweight.name: Pike Push-Ups
bodyweight.form_tips: Inverted V position, nose to floor, vertical press path
bodyweight.progression: Elevate feet, deficit, full handstand push-up

bodyweight.name: Wall Handstand Push-Ups
bodyweight.form_tips: Heels against wall, controlled descent, full lockout
bodyweight.progression: Freestanding, deficit, negative reps

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
dumbbell.form_tips: Seated or standing, core tight, press straight up, full lockout
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, single arm, Arnold press

dumbbell.name: Lateral Raises
dumbbell.form_tips: Slight lean forward, raise to shoulder height, control descent
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, slow tempo, drop sets

dumbbell.name: Front Raises
dumbbell.form_tips: Palms down, raise to eye level, no momentum
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, alternating arms, plate raises

dumbbell.name: Bent-Over Rear Delt Flyes
dumbbell.form_tips: Hinge at hips, slight elbow bend, raise to sides, pinkies up
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, seated variation, slow tempo

bodyweight.name: Bodyweight Squats
bodyweight.form_tips: Feet shoulder-width, knees track toes, depth to parallel
bodyweight.progression: Pause squats, jump squats, pistol squat progression

bodyweight.name: Lunges
bodyweight.form_tips: Step length appropriate, knee doesn't pass toes, upright torso
bodyweight.progression: Walking lunges, reverse lunges, jump lunges

bodyweight.name: Bulgarian Split Squats
bodyweight.form_tips: Rear foot elevated, front knee forward, 90% weight on front leg
bodyweight.progression: Add weight, increase height, tempo training

bodyweight.name: Pistol Squats
bodyweight.form_tips: Balance on one leg, extend other forward, squat deep
bodyweight.progression: Weighted pistols, deficit pistols

bodyweight.name: Glute Bridges
bodyweight.form_tips: Feet close to glutes, thrust hips up, squeeze at top
bodyweight.progression: Single-leg, elevated, add weight

bodyweight.name: Nordic Curls
bodyweight.form_tips: Knees anchored, slow eccentric, use hands to catch
bodyweight.progression: Less hand assistance, full range, weighted

dumbbell.name: Goblet Squats
dumbbell.form_tips: Hold dumbbell at chest, elbows down, full depth
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, pause at bottom, heels elevated

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Romanian Deadlift
dumbbell.form_tips: Slight knee bend, hinge at hips, keep back straight

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Lunges
dumbbell.form_tips: Dumbbells at sides, step and lower, knee tracks toe

dumbbell.name: Single-Leg Calf Raises
dumbbell.form_tips: Hold dumbbell, full range, pause at top, control descent
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, deficit for stretch, slow tempo

bodyweight.name: Diamond Push-Ups
bodyweight.form_tips: Hands form diamond, elbows tucked, tricep focus
bodyweight.progression: Elevate feet, add weight, slow tempo

bodyweight.name: Bench Dips
bodyweight.form_tips: Hands on bench, feet extended, lower until 90°
bodyweight.progression: Elevate feet, add weight on lap, single leg

bodyweight.name: Chin-Ups
bodyweight.form_tips: Underhand grip, full hang, pull to chin, squeeze biceps
bodyweight.progression: Add weight, slow tempo, L-sit chin-ups

dumbbell.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
dumbbell.form_tips: Elbows locked at sides, full range, no swinging

dumbbell.name: Hammer Curls
dumbbell.form_tips: Neutral grip, elbows locked, full range

dumbbell.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
dumbbell.form_tips: Elbows close to head, full stretch, controlled extension
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, single arm, slow tempo

dumbbell.name: Tricep Kickbacks
dumbbell.form_tips: Bend at hip, upper arm parallel to floor, extend fully
dumbbell.progression: Increase weight, pause at top, both arms

bodyweight.name: Plank
bodyweight.form_tips: Forearms down, body straight, squeeze glutes and core
bodyweight.progression: Longer holds, single arm/leg, moving plank

bodyweight.name: Mountain Climbers
bodyweight.form_tips: Plank position, drive knees to chest, maintain core tension
bodyweight.progression: Faster tempo, cross-body, slider variation

bodyweight.name: Hanging Leg Raises
bodyweight.form_tips: Hang from bar, control swing, raise legs to 90°
bodyweight.progression: Toes to bar, L-sit hold, weighted

bodyweight.name: V-Ups
bodyweight.form_tips: Simultaneous arms and legs, touch toes, control descent
bodyweight.progression: Slower tempo, weighted, hold at top

bodyweight.name: Russian Twists
bodyweight.form_tips: Lean back slightly, rotate torso, touch floor each side
bodyweight.progression: Hold weight, feet elevated, slower tempo

bodyweight.name: Dead Bug
bodyweight.form_tips: Back flat on floor, opposite arm and leg extend, core engaged
bodyweight.progression: Add weight, slower tempo, hold position
